 Further personal data will be transferred to Trusted Shops GmbH if you choose to use Trusted Shops products or have already registered for use after completing an order. Whether it is already registered for product use as a buyer is automatically checked on the basis of a neutral parameter, the email address that is cryptological. The email address is converted before the transmission in this hash value that is not to be deciphered for Trusted Shops. After checking for a match, the parameter is automatically deleted.

This website uses the open source web analysis service Matomo, formerly Piwik who works with cookies. The data collected by Matomo are anonymized and saved on the server of LivingData GmbH for analysis purposes on our behalf.

In this case, an opt-out cookie is stored in your web browser that prevents Matomo from storing usage data. If you delete your cookies, however, this means that the Matomo opt-out cookie is also deleted. The opt-out must therefore be reactivated when visiting our site again.

niversally Unique Identifier - Der Unive:
Universally Unique Identifier - The Universally Unique Identifier, or Uuid for short, is a standard for identification numbers. As in a identity card, the number should serve to be able to distinguish two components without any doubt.
 Each ID card has its own ID that identifies a person regardless of name or date of birth - this information is not clear and can apply to any number of people.
 IDS are also an important tool in software development. Whenever information has to be kept apart, a unique ID can help.
 Such IDs are usually determined by the developer himself as soon as they are needed in the project.
 Uuids go one step further: they are considered clear worldwide and more or less guarantee that nobody else uses the same identification number.

uf der Socialmediaguys Website wird zur:
The so-called "Facebook pixel" by Facebook, Facebook Inc., 1 Hacker Way, Menlo Park, CA 94025, USA ("Facebook") is used for conversion measurement.
 With the help of the Facebook pixel, visitors to the social mediaaguys website can be determined as a target group for playing advertisements (so-called "Facebook ads"). Accordingly, Facebook ads are played to users who have shown a potential interest (for example by visiting a specific topic page on the socialmediaguys website). This is also referred to as a Facebook remarketing function. Furthermore, the Facebook pixel helps to follow the behavior of website seekers, which were forwarded to the social media-based website after clicking on a Facebook ad. This allows social media aguys to evaluate and pursue the effectiveness of Facebook ads for statistical and market research purposes and ads and ads can be optimized accordingly.
 As the operator of this website, the data collected are anonymous for the social mediaaguys. However, this data is saved and processed by Facebook and matted with the respective user profile. According to Facebook's data use guideline, this data from Facebook can be used for your own advertising purposes (https://www.facebook.com/about/privacy/).

 The use of the Facebook pixel and thus the analysis of your user behavior takes place on the basis of your previously granted consent, which the social media aguys obtain on the “consent settings” on the social mediaaguys website. You can revoke this consent at any time with effect for the future. In which you open the "consent settings" in the footer of the social mediaaguys website and deactivate the desired slider, you can then confirm your selection by clicking on "Save settings". The revocation of the consent does not affect the legality of the processing due to the revocation due to the consent.

 To determine which type of advertisement you can be played within the Facebook network, you can use the following page: https://www.facebook.com/ads/preferences/?entry_product=AD_SETTINGS_SCREEN
 There you can also deactivate the Facebook remarketing function "Custom Audiences". To do this, you must be registered on Facebook. You can also contradict the use of cookies that are used for range measurement and advertising purposes via the deactivation page via the website of the European Interactive Digital Advertising Alliance: http://www.youronlinechoices.com/de/praferenzmanagement/
